32
RDF and RDF Schema
Blank nodes: structured property values
•
Most real-world data involves structures that are more complicated 
than sets of RDF triple statements
•
In RDF/XML, it is an <rdf:Description> node with no rdf:about
•
In N3, it is an  _:oscarAddress

city:BoadillaDelMonte
Campus de Montegancedo s/n

“Oscar Corcho García”

address:City

This intermediate URI does not 
need to have a name
